sermons.title: "Ministry of Jesus to Troubled Disciples." Ch. 14 (Keswick Convention 1973)
sermons.description: In CHAPTER 14, the Lord is instructing the disciples in the secret of knowing the peace of God in days of crisis and perplexity.

sermons.title: "The Disciples' Relationship with Jesus, the Father & Each Other." Ch. 15 (Keswick Convention 1973)
sermons.description: In CHAPTER 15 verses 1-17, the Lord is instructing the disciples concerning their relationship with Him, with the Father, and with each other.

sermons.title: "The Great High Priestly Prayer" Ch. 17 (Keswick Convention 1973)
sermons.description: In CHAPTER 17, the Lord is in prayer before His Father, concerning Himself (vv.1-5), His disciples (vv. 6-19), and future believers in the Church Universal (vv. 20-26).

sermons.title: "The World, The Disciples and the Holy Spirit." Ch. 15:18-16:33 (Keswick Convention 1973)
sermons.description: In CHAPTER 15 v. 18-CHAPTER 16 v. 33, the Lord is instructing His disciples concerning their relationship with the world, and concerning the ministry of the Holy Spirit.

sermons.title: In The Shadow Of The Cross - Jesus Prays for His Disciples (1)
sermons.preacher_description:
J. Glyn Owen ( - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker J. Glyn Owen in mp3 format. A welshman, Dr. Glyn Owen pastored many congregations with solid biblical exposition of the Holy Scriptures. He took over the pastorate from Martyn Lloyd-Jones after his retirement for 3 years. His preached in some Keswick convention meetings in England and has a heart for Biblical revival.

During his pastorate at Knox Presbyterian Church in downtown Toronto, his preaching ministry attracted many young people who had come to Christ in the counter-culture Jesus Movement, and who were longing for solid biblical teaching.
